title: Florida Public Records Request – Aug. 18, 2023 Arrest of Kenel Barthelus (Drug Trafficking & Pursuit Incident)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of all records related to the arrest of Kenel Barthelus (DOB 10/14/1988) on August 18, 2023, following a pursuit and narcotics trafficking investigation conducted by the Charlotte County Sheriff’s Office Narcotics, S.T.A.R., and Aviation Units.

Specifically, I request the following:

Aviation Unit video footage showing Barthelus' flight from law enforcement, including the discarded narcotics and foot pursuit.

Body-worn camera footage and/or dashcam footage from deputies involved in the initial traffic stop, pursuit, and arrest.

Dashcam footage from police vehicles involved in the high-speed chase.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: FOIL Request – Jan. 11, 2025 DWI Arrest of Janie L. Smith

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

am requesting access to and copies of public records related to the arrest of Janie L. Smith on January 11, 2025, in Waverly, New York, for DWI and other charges following a hit-and-run report near the Valley Bowling Alley on North Chemung Street.

Specifically, I request:

All body-worn camera footage from Waverly Police Department officers involved in the arrest of Ms. Smith, including any verbal interactions during transport or processing.

All patrol vehicle dashcam footage from the stop and arrest location near the Dandy Mini Mart.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Minnesota Data Practices Act Request – Organized Retail Theft Arrest of Jadion Richards and Akwele Lawes-Richards

communications.subject: Minnesota Government Data Practices Act Request: Minnesota Data Practices Act Request – Organized Retail Theft Arrest of Jadion Richards and Akwele Lawes-Richards
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of all public data related to the arrest and investigation of Jadion Richards, 44 and Akwele Lawes-Richards, 45 for organized retail theft, which occurred in Ramsey County in november 2024.

Specifically, I request:

All body-worn and dash camera footage from deputies or officers involved in the arrest of Richards and Lawes-Richards at or near the Rosedale Mall Lululemon location.

Arrest reports, charging documents, and incident reports related to this case.

Any property/evidence logs documenting the seizure of Lululemon merchandise or tools allegedly used to remove security tags.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
